Author: kirin-xiv
Name: Tera Sync
Description:
Share your appearance, mods, and glamour configurations with friends. Synchronize your Penumbra and Glamourer state seamlessly.

Commands:
• /tera or /ts - Opens TeraSync UI
• /tera toggle [on/off] - Toggle synchronization
• /tera gpose - Open character data hub for group posing
• /tera rescan - Rescan mod cache
• /tera perf [seconds] - Show performance statistics
• /tera analyze - Open data analysis UI
• /tera settings - Open settings window
• /ss1 to /ss50 - Syncshell chat commands

Features:
• Real-time appearance and mod synchronization
• Penumbra and Glamourer integration
• Group pose collaboration tools
• Syncshell chat system
• Performance monitoring
• Character data analysis
Punchline: Sync with friends - share your style.
